root.name: StarFront: Collision
root.description: StarFront: Collision is an RTS that shares many similarities to StarCraft. The player will be able to choose between 3 factions, named the Consortium, Myriad, and the Wardens. Each of these factions have their own special abilities, powers, and weaknesses. They're all embroiled in a battle to obtain a precious mineral known as Xenodium. The game is played in a top-down view with on-screen controls. The game supports 4 player online multiplayer, and Gameloft Live 2.0 for leadership boards. It also includes a full campaign mode with 20 missions.
